borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of Condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission reference: 2023/02601/FUL dated 26th April 2024 for the "Erection of a rear extension at second floor level, over part of the first floor back addition; alterations to the existing first floor back addition to include increasing the height, repositioning, and replacement of 2no. existing windows with new enlarged double glazed timber framed windows to the rear elevation, bricking up 2no. existing windows and installation of 2no. small obscure glazed window to the side elevations (east and west); erection of single storey rear extensions to the sides of existing ground floor back addition, following partial demolition of existing ground floor side extensions; installation of new French doors and windows to the rear elevation at ground floor level, following the removal of existing door and windows." Amendments sought to include increase approved roof extension depth by 600mm, re-sizing and relocation of rooflight, installation of new casement windows, replacement of sash and slot windows to casement windows, alterations to ground floor rear door design.
